hero.title: Welcome to BetterGov.ph
hero.subtitle: The volunteer run portal of the Republic of the Philippines. Find information, access government services, stay updated with the latest news about the Philippines.

howItWorks.title: How Petitions Work
howItWorks.subtitle: Learn how to create, promote, and use petitions to drive real change in your community and beyond
howItWorks.stepsSubtitle: From idea to impact, here's how petitions work on our platform

step1.title: Create Your Petition
step1.description: Sign in and create a compelling petition with a clear title, detailed description, and supporting images.
step1.detail1: Choose between local or national petition

step2.title: Share & Promote
step2.description: Share your petition across social media, email, and other channels to reach supporters.
step2.detail2: Copy direct links to share anywhere
step2.detail5: Share in local groups and organizations

step3.title: Gather Support
step3.description: Watch as people sign your petition and add their voices to your cause.
step3.detail1: Supporters can sign with or without comments

step4.title: Make an Impact
step4.description: Use your petition signatures to approach decision-makers and create change.
step4.detail2: Use public support to gain media attention

howItWorks.typesSubtitle: Whether your issue is local or national, we've got you covered
howItWorks.localDescription: Address issues in your city, county, or state
howItWorks.localExample1: Save a local park from development
howItWorks.localExample2: Improve school bus safety in your district
howItWorks.nationalDescription: Tackle issues that affect the entire country
howItWorks.featuresSubtitle: Built-in tools to maximize your petition's impact and reach

feature1.title: National & Local Campaigns
feature1.description: Create petitions for issues affecting your neighborhood or the entire country.

feature2.title: Verified & Secure
feature2.description: All petition creators are verified through secure sign-in, ensuring authentic campaigns.

feature3.title: 60-Day Window
feature3.description: Petitions remain active for 60 days, creating urgency and focused action periods.

feature4.title: Real-Time Progress
feature4.description: Track signatures, engagement, and momentum with live updates and progress bars.

howItWorks.tip1: Write a clear, compelling title that summarizes your cause
howItWorks.tip2: Include specific details about the problem and solution
howItWorks.tip3: Add photos or images to make your petition more engaging
howItWorks.tip4: Set a realistic but ambitious signature goal
howItWorks.tip5: Share on all your social media platforms
howItWorks.tip6: Email friends, family, and colleagues personally
howItWorks.tip7: Reach out to local media and community groups
howItWorks.tip8: Post updates to keep momentum going
howItWorks.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of people who are using petitions to create positive change in their communities and beyond.
